title: Trial By Assembly
story_summary: As the truth about BCI abuses fills the tribunals, crowds watch leaders stand trial and alliances collapse. Testimonies spark fierce debate and citywide protests. By the end, citizens unite to write a new charter, breaking algorithmic control and taking back the future of Stenograd.

official.headline: Public Testimonies Begin
official.anchor_line: Citywide citizen tribunals gather to review recent events and strengthen community trust.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparent public participation confirms the city's collective spirit and supports continuous system improvement.

official.headline: Debate Sparks Reform
official.anchor_line: Lively public discussions reshape Council alliances as Stenograd pursues stability and innovation.
official.contextual_reframing: Active dialogue ensures adaptive governance, reinforcing unity and the promise of constructive change.

official.headline: New Era Unfolds
official.anchor_line: Stenograd embraces collective review as accountability processes and new community charters take form.
official.contextual_reframing: Mass participation and public vision guide Stenograd into a phase of renewed trust, order, and direction.

underground.headline: Ghosts Speak Out
underground.anchor_line: Testimonies from vanished citizens finally surface after years of silence.
underground.contextual_reframing: People once erased by the system are naming the crimes in public. The old silence is broken. No screen can hide what's heard now.

underground.headline: Council Cracks Show
underground.anchor_line: Council factions turn on each other as damning evidence tears stability to pieces.
underground.contextual_reframing: So much for perfect order. Even those who wrote the rules are running scared as the public demands justice  -  real, messy, human justice.

underground.headline: Stenograd on Trial
underground.anchor_line: Citizens reclaim the streets, forcing leaders to answer for systematic disappearances and abuses.
underground.contextual_reframing: Real voices fill the void propaganda left behind. Truth isn't efficient  -  but it's breaking the city free, one testimony at a time.
